meanings.definition: Put forward (an idea or plan) for consideration.
meanings.sent1: She is proposing a new project at work.
meanings.sent2: He is proposing a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: The team was proposing so many ideas, it was hard to keep track.
meanings.sent4: The artist was proposing a bold vision for the mural.
meanings.sent5: By proposing his theory, he sparked a lively debate.

meanings.definition: Make a marriage proposal to someone.
meanings.sent1: He is proposing to his girlfriend on their anniversary.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised when he got down on one knee and started proposing.
meanings.sent3: The dog was proposing to the cat in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The prince was proposing to the princess in front of the whole kingdom.
meanings.sent5: By proposing at sunset, he made the moment even more romantic.

meanings.sent1: I am proposing to start a new hobby next month.
meanings.sent2: They are proposing to visit their grandparents over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat was proposing to take a nap in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The student was proposing to study harder for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: By proposing to save money, she was able to go on a vacation.
